mapper.select: SELECT e.*, j.job_name, g.group_name FROM ly_employee e LEFT JOIN ly_job j ON e.job_id = j.id LEFT JOIN ly_group g ON e.group_id = g.id WHERE 1=1 AND e.enable = 1 AND e.employee_name like CONCAT('%', #{employeeName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')

SELECT e.*, j.job_name, g.group_name FROM ly_employee e LEFT JOIN ly_job j ON e.job_id = j.id LEFT JOIN ly_group g ON e.group_id = g.id WHERE g.id IN ( SELECT group_id FROM ly_dispatch_rel dr WHERE dr.enable = 1 AND #{month} BETWEEN dr.start_date AND dr.end_date )
